pages.text: $(#25228d)Leaves Oil behind that causes zombies to slip and get stunned.

text: $(br)$(#bd951a)Special: $()$(#ff0000)Leaves an Oil tile under it after exploding.
$(br)$(#bd951a)Oily Olive originates from far within the Mediterranean and has come to this mysterious land to study culinary techniques.
